WorkItem.Description:
Rawr encountered an error while attempting to load a saved image, so is retrying. If you encounter this error multiple times, please ensure that Rawr is unzipped in a location that you have full file read/write access, such as your Desktop, or My Documents. 
 
Started receiving this error when loading my hunter (Dailo, Kazzak, EU).
 
Other characters appear to work.
WorkItem.Summary: [Hunter] Rawr encountered an error while attempting to load a saved image

Comments.Message: Is there no more information you can give on this? Like the actual error message which should have a call stack.

I'm not able to replicate this issue with 2.3.13 Release or the current Dev.

I'll have to close the issue without more details.
